001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.api.tools.SegbinGrepCli;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.logging.LoggingConfigurator;
005import java.util.Arrays;
006import java.util.Locale;
007import java.util.stream.Stream;
008import org.slf4j.Logger;
009import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
010
011/**
012 * RADAR CLI dispatcher that routes to subcommands.
013 *
014 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
015 */
016public final class Main {
017  private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Main.class);
018  private static final String SUMMARY_USAGE =
019      "usage: radar <capture|live|assemble|poster|segbingrep> [options]";
020  private static final String HELP_TEXT = """
021      RADAR command dispatcher
022
023      Usage:
024        radar <command> [options]
025
026      Commands:
027        capture     Packet capture pipeline (capture --help for details)
028        live        Live processing pipeline (live --help for details)
029        assemble    Assemble captured segments into higher-level pairs
030        poster      Render reconstructed traffic to files or Kafka
031        segbingrep  Search segment binaries for literal byte sequences
032
033      Global flags:
034        --help      Show this message
035        --verbose   Enable DEBUG logging before dispatching to subcommand
036      """;
037
038  private Main() {}
039
040  /**
041   * Entry point invoked by the JVM.
042   *
043   * @param args raw CLI arguments
044   */
045  public static void main(String[] args) {
046    ExitCode exit = run(args);
047    System.exit(exit.code());
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Dispatches a subcommand and returns its exit code without terminating the JVM.
052   *
053   * @param args dispatcher arguments (first token is the subcommand)
054   * @return exit code reported by the delegated CLI
055   */
056  static ExitCode run(String[] args) {
057    CliInput input = CliInput.parse(args);
058    if (input.help()) {
059      CliPrinter.println(HELP_TEXT.stripTrailing());
060      return ExitCode.SUCCESS;
061    }
062    if (input.verbose()) {
063      LoggingConfigurator.enableVerboseLogging();
064      log.debug("Verbose logging enabled for dispatcher");
065    }
066
067    String[] remainder = input.keyValueArgs();
068    if (remainder.length == 0) {
069      log.error("Missing command");
070      CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
071      return ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
072    }
073
074    String command = remainder[0].toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
075        String[] delegateArgs =
076        Stream.concat(
077                input.flags().stream(),
078                Arrays.stream(remainder, 1, remainder.length))
079            .toArray(String[]::new);
080
081    return switch (command) {
082      case "capture" -> CaptureCli.run(delegateArgs);
083      case "live" -> LiveCli.run(delegateArgs);
084      case "assemble" -> AssembleCli.run(delegateArgs);
085      case "poster" -> PosterCli.run(delegateArgs);
086      case "segbingrep" -> SegbinGrepCli.run(delegateArgs);
087      default -> {
088        log.error("Unknown command: {}", command);
089        CliPrinter.println(SUMMARY_USAGE);
090        yield ExitCode.INVALID_ARGS;
091      }
092    };
093  }
094}
